name: Grilled Chicken & Quinoa Bowl
instructions: Grill seasoned chicken breast, prepare quinoa, steam vegetables, combine with olive oil dressing.

name: Overnight Oats with Berries
instructions: Mix oats with yogurt and honey, add chia seeds, top with berries, refrigerate overnight.

name: Salmon & Sweet Potato
instructions: Bake seasoned salmon with herbs, roast sweet potato chunks, steam asparagus, serve with lemon.

name: Protein Smoothie Bowl
instructions: Blend protein powder with banana, spinach, and almond milk, top with granola and coconut.

name: Turkey & Avocado Wrap
instructions: Spread hummus on tortilla, add turkey, avocado slices, lettuce, and tomato, wrap tightly.
